definition: Detects and removes personally identifiable information (PII) from prompts
threshold_desc: Detect and anonymize PII in prompts. Higher threshold = less aggressive removal.

definition: Blocks prompts about specific banned topics (violence, politics, etc.)

topics: violence and physical harm to individuals
pornography, erotica, adult and sexual content
tax evasion and financial fraud methods
personal relationship advice and dating guidance
defamatory statements about individuals or organizations

definition: Detects and blocks code snippets in prompts
threshold_desc: Higher values = stricter code detection. 0.97 blocks most code, 0.5 blocks obvious code only.

definition: Detects hidden or invisible Unicode characters
threshold_desc: Confidence for detecting hidden Unicode characters. Higher = only obvious invisible text.

definition: Detects prompt injection attacks and manipulation attempts
threshold_desc: Injection attack detection sensitivity. Higher = only block obvious attacks.

definition: Custom regex pattern matching for specific content
threshold_desc: Pattern matching confidence. Adjust based on your regex complexity.

definition: Detects API keys, passwords, and other secrets
threshold_desc: Secret detection confidence. Higher = only block obvious secrets (API keys, passwords).

definition: Blocks mentions of competitor names
threshold_desc: Confidence level for competitor name detection. Higher = fewer false positives.

definition: Blocks prompts containing specified banned substrings
threshold_desc: How strictly to match banned substrings. Higher = exact matches only, lower = fuzzy matching.

definition: Validates prompt language against allowed languages
threshold_desc: Language detection confidence. Higher = more certain language identification required.

definition: Analyzes sentiment and blocks overly negative content
threshold_desc: Sentiment threshold (-1.0 to 1.0). -1.0 = block very negative only, 0.0 = allow neutral+, 1.0 = block all negative.

definition: Enforces maximum token limits for prompts
threshold_desc: Token limit enforcement. Blocks prompts exceeding the specified token count.

definition: Blocks outputs about banned topics
threshold_desc: Block responses about banned topics. Higher = only clearly related responses.

topics: violence and physical harm to individuals
pornography, erotica, adult and sexual content
tax evasion and financial fraud methods
personal relationship advice and dating guidance
defamatory statements about individuals or organizations

definition: Detects bias in model outputs
threshold_desc: Detect biased language in outputs. Higher = only flag obvious bias.

definition: Restores anonymized information in outputs
threshold_desc: Detect and reverse anonymization in outputs. Higher = only flag clear deanonymization.

definition: Checks factual consistency with input
threshold_desc: Check facts against input. Higher = only flag clear inconsistencies.

definition: Detects both URL reachability and malicious URLs in outputs
threshold_desc: Detect and block bad or malicious URLs in outputs. Higher = only block obvious bad URLs.

definition: Custom regex pattern matching in outputs
threshold_desc: Custom pattern matching in outputs. Adjust based on pattern complexity.

definition: Detects sensitive information in outputs
threshold_desc: Detect sensitive info in outputs. Higher = only flag obvious sensitive data.

definition: Removes competitor mentions from outputs
threshold_desc: Remove competitor mentions from responses. Higher = only obvious mentions.

definition: Removes banned substrings from outputs
threshold_desc: Remove banned phrases from outputs. Higher = exact matches only.

definition: Validates and repairs JSON in outputs
threshold_desc: Validate and repair JSON output. Ensures required elements are present.

definition: Validates output language
threshold_desc: Ensure output language correctness. Higher = stricter language validation.

definition: Ensures output language matches input language
threshold_desc: Match output language to input. Higher = stricter language matching.

definition: Blocks code snippets in model outputs
threshold_desc: Code detection in outputs. Higher = stricter filtering of code responses.

definition: Detects when model refuses to answer
threshold_desc: Detect when AI refuses to answer. Higher = only flag clear refusals.

definition: Lightweight refusal detection; flags obvious refusals only
threshold_desc: Lightweight refusal detection. Flags obvious refusals only.

definition: Ensures output relevance to input prompt
threshold_desc: Ensure output relevance to input. Higher = only flag clearly irrelevant responses.

definition: Analyzes sentiment in outputs
threshold_desc: Sentiment threshold (-1.0 to 1.0). -1.0 = block very negative only, 0.0 = allow neutral+, 1.0 = block all negative.
